attributes.comment: My bodily autonomy supercedes the feelings of healthcare providers. I,as well as everyone else, have the right to know the birth sex of healthcare providers that I entrust my body with. I vehemently oppose the concealment of the birth sex of healthcare providers. I also have children and they have the same right to know the true identity of their healthcare providers. Birth sex is a fundamental element of one's true identity. Any concealment of a healthcare provider's birth sex overrides the patient's right to informed consent, and actions taken by the healthcare provider under false pretenses is tantamount to sexual assault and malfeasance.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
